answers.answer: I cannot answer all of the fiscal questions you'll have to ask your neurosurgeon.  My guess is that if you lose 5 pounds and then regain it quickly it is because of water retention rather than gaining real weight.  If that is true that it is the management of your diabetes insipidus that will help you the most in terms of controlling your weight.  I would be encouraged if I were you by the fact that you can lose 5 pounds, which means that you probably have not had damage in the appetite control part of the hypothalamus.  Watch out for emotional eating.  One binge can make a lot of difference.
